activities: Spooky Cool Labs ("Spooky") collects user's Facebook ID, e-mail address, last name, first name, gender, birth date and friend count.  Spooky uses this information for the purpose of general communications with users regarding game events, game milestones, on-going contests and future contests, offers for virtual goods or services by Spooky, notifications concerning  new features and updates to the game, notifications of new and other Spooky games available for play, and other game-related activities.  Additionally, technical information such as the users OS, platform, web browser, device identifier or IP address, MAC address and geographic location may be accessed to help Spooky provide the service, track installs, provide for game improvement and troubleshoot bugs and errors.  All information collected by Spooky is securely retained on internal servers.  E-mail and game information is also securely provided and retained by Pulse Point, a marketing services provider, for use on Spooky’s behalf for e-mail marketing services.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Data collected directly on the Internet
